title: Relist an item
description: Relist an item that has expired. Relists an item without modifying editable fields.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

fields.name: ListingId
fields.description: The ID of the listing that is being withdrawn, relisted or extended.

fields.name: ReturnListingDetails
fields.description: Indicates whether full listing details should be returned in the Listing field.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.

fields.name: Listing
fields.description: The state of the listing, after the listing operation has successfully completed. This field is only present if the ReturnListingDetails parameter is true and the operation was successful. This field will also be missing if there was an error retrieving the listing details. For more information on this field, see the documentation for the listing details API.

fields.name: ListingGroupId
fields.description: The identifier of the group of related multi-variant listings. Blank if the listing is not multi-variant

fields.name: Variants
fields.description: The individual variants created in the group of related multi-variant listings.
